LanguageData.Leather_Bison_Westerado.label: bison fur
LanguageData.Leather_Bison_Westerado.description: Tanned bison fur. It is durable in combat, and provides protection from weather.
LanguageData.Leather_GilaMonster_Westerado.label: gila-monster skin
LanguageData.Leather_GilaMonster_Westerado.descriptio: The tanned skin of a cold-blooded Gila Monster. Gila Monster skin is reasonably tough, but does not insulate well at all.
LanguageData.Leather_Coyote_Westerado.label: coyote fur
LanguageData.Leather_Coyote_Westerado.description: The pelt of a coyote. It protects well from the cold and sharp objects alike.
